author: .vshvsh
content: You mean how we force node operators to exit? There's no technical solution for this on our side. We thought about making all validation keys threshold and issue an exit via threshold signing but decided against it for v1. Too many moving details, and we thought that malicious/erroneous slashings due to attacks or malfunctions were a greater threat than node operators not complying with requests for withdrawals

author: .vshvsh
content: It's fair to say that slashings during withdrawals are the main problem for Lido
